content: स्तोमः [स्तु-मन् <ls>Uṇ. 1. 137</ls>] {@--1@} Praise, eulogium, hymn. {@--2@} A sacrifice, oblation; as in ज्योतिष्टोम, अग्निष्टोम. {@--3@} A {%Soma%} libation. {@--4@} A collection, multitude, number, group, assemblage; <ls>U. 1. 51.</ls> {@--5@} A large quantity, mass; भस्मस्तोमपवित्रलांछनमुरो धत्ते त्वचं रौरवीं <ls>U. 4. 20</ls>, <ls>Mv. 1. 18.</ls> --मं {@--1@} The head. {@--2@} Riches, wealth. {@--3@} Grain, corn. {@--4@} An iron-pointed stick or shaft.
